about_the_game:
"Leave a thought in every heart you happen by, as tea so fondly stains the pot it's in

Be warmth that lingers on the fingers held high. The smallest kindness lets their tale begin."

 

Relive a nostalgic lifetime and make new friends as retiree and tea enthusiast Ms. Meadows in her homely boutique in the British countryside.

Sips & Sonnets lets you:

  • Be a nice old lady. The "nice" part is not optional.

  • Make a variety of teas. Learn more about each kind of tea as you play!

  • Chat up customers from all walks of life.

  • Draw inspiration from your daily interactions with your clientele to write your latest poem!

  • Your dialogue choices matter! Choose wisely and see all multiple endings! 

Inspired by our personal experiences with local tea shops across the United Kingdom, as well as countless wholesome interactions with kind and wise role models in our lives, this heartfelt visual novel tells a side less told, of a life well lived, and a youth come and gone.

Sips & Sonnets is brought to you by Blue Tango Street, the same team that gave you the brief and humble experience of Backspace Backspace Backspace. This visual novel was made possible thanks to the immensely talented artwork of Naomi Rossman!

Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10 or later
  • Processor: Intel-based Mac (1 GHz or faster)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (such as Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Run a tea shop in the British countryside and discover (or rediscover) your love for poetry in this short, heartfelt visual novel. You play as Ms. Meadows, a retired old lady with a life well-lived and a passion for chai!
